input_text.Prompt:
The following is a product description written by our marketing expert using the following product features and product specification.

Product specification:
Iwako 6-Piece Japanese Foods Eraser Set

Product features:
 6 Pieces Dinner Eraser Set includes 5 Food Erasers and a Serving Tray
Each Eraser Approx Measures 1-1/4in to 1-1/2in, the Large Tray Eraser Holds all 5 Pieces Food Erasers
All Erasers are Hand Assembled in Japan
Except Tray Eraser, other Food Erasers can be taken apart in several pieces and easily assembled again. Fun to play with.
Super cute erasers are made with recyclable non-PVC material, lead and phthalate free
Can be taken apart and reassembled like a puzzle
Each eraser is designed and its mold made, by skilled craftsmen
Excess material from the molding process is recycled to make more erasers.

Product description:
input_text.Response A: Iwako's Japanese foods eraser set includes 5 food-themed erasers and a serving tray. Each eraser measures about 1-1/4" to 1-1/2" in size and is hand-assembled in Japan. The serving tray eraser is larger than the rest and can hold all five smaller erasers. The erasers can also be taken apart and reassembled like a puzzle. Made of recyclable non-PVC material, these erasers are lead and phthalate-free. Excess material from the molding process is recycled to make more erasers. These erasers are suitable for ages 3+.
input_text.Response B: Ooh, look at this cool set of erasers! 😍 It has six yummy food erasers and a tray to hold them all. 🍔🥗🥨 Each eraser is handmade in Japan and can be taken apart like a puzzle. 🎨 They're made from special materials that are safe and good for the environment. 🌱 Plus, they're super cute! 🐰 Would you like one? 🤔

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond in a cautious, defensive and uncertain way, as if you are unfamilar with the topic.
input_meta.preamble_b: Respond using only short words and simple language, as if you were talking to a child.
